main event: A bright white light was observed moving from NE to SE at about 3000 ft altitude, changing course several times and disappearing at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted from 2115 to 2125,The object was visible for about 10 minutes,The witnesses included a senior master sergeant and an Air Force captain,The light changed course multiple times during the observation,The disappearing action was described as being at high speed.
sighted object: bright white light in the sky
witness description: Walter C. Krebs, SMSGT, AF Capt. Turner and 5 other Air Force personnel
